XenotypeDef.label: Cyborg Ravager
XenotypeDef.description: One of Greyscythe Industries' staple designs, the Ravager is a combat cyborg designed to quickly close distances and shred their enemies with brutal speed and effeciency. A relatively lean design, they still require a decent amount of nutrition to sustain themselves due to their Core Engines. Originally designed as one of the models chosen to "Tame the Rim", they were eventually simply bundled and sold as Made-To-Order mercenaries.
XenotypeDef.descriptionShort: A staple combat cyborg of Greyscythe Industries, designed to close quickly and shred their enemies.

XenotypeDef.label: Cyborg Crusher
XenotypeDef.description: One of Greyscythe Industries' staple designs, the Crusher is a combat cyborg designed to quickly close distances, absorbing damage and destroying emplacements and heavy armor. A relatively lean design, they still require a decent amount of nutrition to sustain themselves due to their Core Engines. Originally designed as one of the models chosen to "Tame the Rim", they were eventually simply bundled and sold as Made-To-Order mercenaries.
XenotypeDef.descriptionShort: A staple combat cyborg of Greyscythe Industries, designed as a close combat anti-armor siege weapon.

XenotypeDef.label: Cyborg Pathfinder
XenotypeDef.description: One of Greyscythe Industries' staple designs, the Pathfinder is a combat cyborg designed to scout out hostile positions and pick off important targets from a safe distance. A relatively lean design, they still require a decent amount of nutrition to sustain themselves due to their Core Engines. Originally designed as one of the models chosen to "Tame the Rim", they were eventually simply bundled and sold as Made-To-Order mercenaries.
XenotypeDef.descriptionShort: A staple combat cyborg of Greyscythe Industries, designed as a close combat anti-armor siege weapon.

XenotypeDef.label: Cyborg Raider
XenotypeDef.description: One of Greyscythe Industries' staple designs, the Raider is a lightweight skirmisher designed for short-ranged fast-paced hit and run engagements. A relatively lean design, they still require a decent amount of nutrition to sustain themselves due to their Core Engines. Originally designed as one of the models chosen to "Tame the Rim", they were eventually simply bundled and sold as Made-To-Order mercenaries.
XenotypeDef.descriptionShort: A staple combat cyborg of Greyscythe Industries, designed as a close combat anti-armor siege weapon.

XenotypeDef.label: Cyborg Marauder
XenotypeDef.description: One of Greyscythe Industries' staple designs, the Marauder is the workhorse infantry replacement model cyborg. A relatively lean design, they still require a decent amount of nutrition to sustain themselves due to their Core Engines. Originally designed as one of the models chosen to "Tame the Rim", they were eventually simply bundled and sold as Made-To-Order mercenaries.
XenotypeDef.descriptionShort: A staple combat cyborg of Greyscythe Industries, designed as a close combat anti-armor siege weapon.
